DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study preliminarily assess efficacy electroacupuncture ( EA ) woman pure stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Electroacupuncture ( EA ) Women With Pure Stress Urinary Incontinence ( SUI )
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot randomize , placebo control trial preliminarily assess efficacy EA woman pure SUI . Eligible participant randomly assign EA group sham EA group 1:1 ratio via central randomization system acupuncturists . Participants , outcome assessor statistician blind treatment allocation . Subject blind achieve via aid adhesive pad use group , placebo needle blunt tip sham EA electrode line . Assuming two-sided alpha 0.05 , power 90 % , 20 % drop-out , sample size 36 would need group . The investigator expand sample size 80 case ( 40 case per group ) increase reliability study . The investigator perform statistical analysis base intention-to-treat principle . All patient accept randomization include analysis . Missing data fill last observed value . Student test Mann-Whitney U test use comparison continuous variable ; chi-square test , Fisher 's exact test Kruskal-Wallis H test use compare categorical variable , appropriate . For measure collect two time point , pair t-tests Wilcoxon sign rank test use appropriate . A statistically significant difference set P < 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: Eligible woman 40 75 year age , meet clinical diagnosis recommendation SUI International Consultation Urological Diseases : involuntary urine leakage effort , exertion , sneeze cough stop stress end ; visible involuntary leakage urethra synchronous increase abdominal pressure , pad weight gain > 1 g 1hour pad test ; without symptom urinary frequency urgency . Women exclude study meet follow criterion : *other type urinary incontinence ( UI ) ( urge , mixed , overflow UI , etc ) ; symptomatic urinary tract infection ; ever receive UI pelvic surgery ; severity pelvic organ prolapse ≥ degree 2 ; residual urinary volume > 30 ml ; maximum flow rate ≤ 20 ml/s ; limited walking , stairs climb running ; receive specialize treatment SUI , take medicine affect bladder function ; serious cardiovascular , cerebral , liver , kidney , psychiatric disease , diabetes , multiple system atrophy , injury cauda equina , myeleterosis ; pregnant breastfeeding ; cardiac pacemaker , metal allergy severe needle phobia ; unlike give write formed consent .
